title: MBallSectionsDR
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Trump fields question about his timeline for judicial nominations: 'We're putting 'em in rapidly'
items.description: President Donald Trump fielded a question about his timeline for making judicial nominations, stating, "we're putting 'em in rapidly."

items.title: The Last Thing America Needs Right Now Is War With Iran
items.description: As pressure mounts for yet another regime-change war — this time with Iran — it is imperative that the U.S. resist calls for escalation.

items.title: Trump says Stephen Miller at top of the list for national security adviser
items.description: President Trump said Deputy Chief of Staff for Policy Stephen Miller is the leading contender to fill the role of national security adviser.

items.title: Senate Democrats predicting 'brutal' UN ambassador confirmation hearing for Mike Waltz
items.description: Senate Democrats predict that former National Security Adviser Mike Waltz will have a "brutal confirmation hearing" for his new role as U.N. ambassado...

items.title: 'The Rock' reboot?: Alcatraz may get new life under President Trump
items.description: President Trump wants to reopen the maximum security prison on Alcatraz Island in San Francisco Bay to house the "dregs of society."

items.title: Wall Street slumps over Trump's latest tariff threat on films
items.description: President Trump's proposal to slap a 100% tariff on movies produced outside the U.S. reverberated across Wall Street markets Monday.

items.title: Congress Should Decide Harvard’s Tax Exemption
items.description: The Supreme Court should never have made the president the arbiter of the community’s conscience in deciding when colleges must be taxed.

items.title: Pope Don, &c.
items.description: On Trump and the GOP; capitalism and imperialism; the Epstein case; notable centenarians; and more.

items.title: There’s No Way to Replace the Income Tax with Tariffs
items.description: Even if it could raise enough revenue (which it can’t), it would undercut Trump’s other tariff goals.

items.title: It Took Me Only 30 Seconds To Order Deadly Abortion Pills In A State Where They’re Illegal
items.description: Like an Amazon for abortion pills, Plan C proudly boasts it can help users obtain 'pills by mail in every state.'

items.title: Senator warns of 'unconstitutional' judicial overreach ahead of SCOTUS showdown
items.description: Sen. Charles Grassley of Iowa tells Fox News Digital there should be an end to nationwide injunctions, and he knows how it can work.

items.title: FDA Commissioner Can’t Ignore Damning New Data On The Dangers Of Mifepristone
items.description: It’s time for the Trump administration to put back in place the safety regulations on mifepristone without delay.

items.title: Heads of NPR, PBS explore legal challenges against Trump's push to strip their funding
items.description: The leaders of National Public Radio and the Public Broadcasting Service said Sunday they are mulling over their legal options now that President Trum...

items.title: Real ID is about to go into effect. Here's how it may impact voting
items.description: REAL ID goes into effect as legislation makes its way through Congress to verify that only U.S. citizens are casting their ballot in U.S. elections.

items.title: EXCLUSIVE: Cornyn bringing bill to enshrine Trump EO renaming refuge after Jocelyn Nungaray into law
items.description: Sen. John Cornyn wants to enshrine into the law the renaming of a national wildlife refuge after Jocelyn Nungaray so it can't be changed by future adm...

items.title: Pope Trump Goes Up in Orange Smoke
items.description: The nonsense we talk about vs. rare spiritual opportunities.

items.title: China’s Rising Naval Dominance Threatens U.S. Commerce And Safety
items.description: China’s race to be a maritime superpower presents the greatest threat to the U.S. since the British burned down the White House in 1814.

items.title: Trump threatens a 100% tariff on foreign-made films, saying the movie industry in the U.S. is dying
items.description: President Trump is opening a new salvo in his tariff war, targeting films made outside the U.S.

items.title: America Must Lead in the Middle East with Strength, Not Slogans
items.description: U.S. leadership can’t be built on one-off deals or delusions of grand bargains.

items.title: Young Canadians Voted Against Spending Orgy, But Their Insulated Parents Won
items.description: Younger Canadians stuck living with their parents and unable to afford starting families supported the Conservative Party. Liberals won.
